entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:50 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
